alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 3:13PM EST until December 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills continuing. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of Northeast Kentucky and Central and South Central Ohio. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 PM EST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
